title: gzclient causes crashes of master - Might be issue unrelated to cloudsim

content.raw:
I don't know if this bug is related to cloudsim.

Run configuration trio.
Run atlas simulation (launched via console).
everything is ok with simulator computer, field computer and local vpn connected computer: run rviz ok and rzgraph also.

As soon as running gzclient, everything crashes:

the field computer lost connection to master, the local VPN computer as well, so I guess that the master has crashed on the simulator computer.

Error [InsertModelWidget.cc:252] model.config file is missing in directory["/usr/local/share/drcsim-1.3/models/test"]
Qt has caught an exception thrown from an event handler. Throwing
exceptions from an event handler is not supported in Qt. You must
reimplement QApplication::notify() and catch all exceptions there.

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::ItemIdentityException'
  what():  OGRE EXCEPTION(5:ItemIdentityException): Can not find codec for 'png' image format.
There are no formats supported (no codecs registered). in Codec::getCodec at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreCodec.cpp (line 69)
content.html:
I don't know if this bug is related to cloudsim.

Run configuration trio. Run atlas simulation (launched via console). everything is ok with simulator computer, field computer and local vpn connected computer: run rviz ok and rzgraph also.

As soon as running gzclient, everything crashes:

the field computer lost connection to master, the local VPN computer as well, so I guess that the master has crashed on the simulator computer.

Error [InsertModelWidget.cc:252] model.config file is missing in directory["/usr/local/share/drcsim-1.3/models/test"] Qt has caught an exception thrown from an event handler. Throwing exceptions from an event handler is not supported in Qt. You must reimplement QApplication::notify() and catch all exceptions there.

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::ItemIdentityException' what(): OGRE EXCEPTION(5:ItemIdentityException): Can not find codec for 'png' image format. There are no formats supported (no codecs registered). in Codec::getCodec at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreCodec.cpp (line 69)
